OrgName: Columbia Sportswear Company and its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries
PPLoc: HR - Company Intranet, and see link below; ECommerce - ecommerce websites indicated above
activities:
HR Purposes: name, work email address, wage, position, job description, benefits information, home address, performance evaluation information

E-Comm Purposes: customer data for marketing and sales transactions, including first and last name, contact information (email, phone), billing and shipping addresses, gender and date of birth

recoursemech: We will cooperate with data protection authorities located in the EU (EU DPAs) and Switzerland (Swiss FDPIC) or their authorized representatives
